author: andyc
msg: Needed to adjust the count when valid multi-byte sequences.

author: andyc
msg: Fixed some lurking problems in the custom UTF-8 reader class.
This reader still needs some heavy testing but it definitely
seems to work for Unicode characters 0-127, inclusive. ;)

author: andyc
msg: 1) Added comments to document the entity manager/scanner impl better.
2) Removed dead code for an optimization that turned out not to help
3) Added XMLEntityScanner#isExternal():boolean method so that the
DTD scanner can determine if the entity that is being scanned is

author: lehors
msg: Changed skipSeparator to return true if the end of a parameter entity was
crossed - this is done by monitoring the depth of parameter entities we have,
which is stored in a new field called fPEDepth.
Added a skipSpaces() method which returns true when there is a whitespace
or when the end of parameter entity is crossed. It is
similar to skipSeparator but it does not deal with PE refs.
Improved scanEntityDecl to handle PE refs before the entity name.
